meanings.definition: Remaining or calculated after taxes have been deducted.
meanings.sent1: The aftertax amount was lower than expected.
meanings.sent2: She received her aftertax salary at the end of the month.
meanings.sent3: The aftertax total made him rethink his spending habits.
meanings.sent4: Her aftertax income was a mere fraction of her gross earnings.
meanings.sent5: The aftertax figure was a stark reminder of financial responsibilities.

meanings.definition: Income or earnings that have been adjusted for taxes.
meanings.sent1: He carefully reviewed his aftertax earnings for the year.
meanings.sent2: The aftertax amount was deposited directly into his account.
meanings.sent3: The aftertax money seemed to disappear faster than expected.
meanings.sent4: Her aftertax income allowed her to budget more effectively.
meanings.sent5: The aftertax total was a pleasant surprise after the tax season.
